text: Hi, I'm John Smith from Acme Corp. You can reach me at john.smith@acmecorp.com or call me at +1-555-0123. I'm interested in your Enterprise plan.
Please invoice to: TechStart Inc, 123 Main Street, San Francisco, CA 94105. Attention: Jane Doe, CFO. Total amount: $12,450.00 for Q4 services.
Meeting scheduled for tomorrow, March 15th at 2:30 PM PST. Attendees: Alice (alice@example.com), Bob (bob@example.com). Topic: Q1 Review.
Order #ORD-98765: 3x Widget Pro ($49.99 each), 1x Widget Premium ($99.99). Shipping: $15.00. Tax: $18.45. Total: $283.44. Ship to: 456 Oak Ave, Austin, TX 78701.

Bug Report: Application crashes when uploading files larger than 10MB. Browser: Chrome 120, OS: Windows 11. Reproducible: Yes. Severity: High. Steps: 1. Click upload 2. Select file >10MB 3. Click submit 4. App freezes.

expected.issue: Application crashes when uploading files larger than 10MB
